chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in exd (L (B m k x) k x y) z <-> exd m z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
inv_hmap_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
inversion_planarity : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> planar (L m k x y) -> planar m
A_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), y <> x -> A (B m k x) k y = A m k y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
A_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B m k x) k x = nil
not_eqc_planar : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m k x y -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m k x y)
incr_genus : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> genus m <= genus (L m k x y)
A_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A_1 m k x -> A (B_1 m k x) k y = A m k y
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cA_cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
weak_planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m < -> planar (L m zero x y)
weak_planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m < -> planar (L m one x y)
eqc_cA_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x (cA m k y) -> eqc m x y
planarity_crit_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y)
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
exd_D : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> x <> z -> exd m z < -> exd (D m x) z
exd_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (B m k x) z
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
expf_planar_rcp_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
eqc_cA_1_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m (cA_1 m k x) y -> eqc m x y
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
B_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B m k x = m
A_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A (B m k x) j y = A m j y
expf_planar_rcp_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
MF.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MF.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
planarity_criterion_RCP_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y

```intros. intros. destruct H1. split.
- intros. unfold exd in H1, H2. simpl in H2. simpl. exact (H2 z).
- intros. unfold exd in H1, H2. simpl in H2. simpl. exact (H2 z).```
